Circulars for website(Cicular) 
RESTRICTED 
NO. CAS-5(5)-2008-DIV-1(COSAH)  
BUREAU OF CIVIL AVIATION SECURITY  
(MINISTRY OF CIVIL AVIATION) 
GOVERNMENT OF INDIA 
A’ WING, JANPATH  BHAWAN, 
JANPATH , NEW DELHI-110001 
Date: 3/12/2008 
 
AVSEC ORDER NO. 05/2008 
 
Subject : Shifting of COSAH/CC Control Room 
 
Commissioner of Security (Civil Aviation), Bureau of Civil Aviation 
Security (BCAS), in exercise of powers conferred by Section 5A of Aircraft 
Act 1934 delegated to him vide Government of India, Ministry of Civil 
Aviation Notification No. 1797 dated July 3, 1997 for the purpose of 
securing the safety of aircraft operation directs that :- 
 
I. 
The Committee of Secretaries on Aircraft Hijack (COSAH) Control 
Room, presently located at Room No. 358 & 359, Rajiv Gandhi Bhawan, 
Ministry of Civil Aviation, Safdarjung airport, New Delhi, is hereby shifted 
to Committee Room (I Floor) in Cabinet Secretariat, New Delhi. 
  
II. 
Central Committee Control Room (CCCR) is hereby shifted from 
New ATC Building at IGI Airport to Room No. 358 and 359, Rajiv Gandhi 
Bhawan, Ministry of Civil Aviation, Safdarjung airport, New Delhi. 
 
 
Both the Control Rooms stand operationalised with immediate effect.  
 
 
 
 
(D.S.Chauhan) 
Addl. Commissioner of Security (CA)  
 
 
Distribution:  All concerned.
